item.title: Really Sticky Ribs
item.description: Ingredients 400ml / 14 fl.oz Tomato Passata 2 garlic cloves, crushed 2 tbsp soy sauce 2 tbsp clear honey 1 tbsp worcestershire sauce 1kg / 2lb 4oz pork ribs Method In a large bowl, mix together the passata, garlic, soy sauce, honey & worcestershire sauce. Add the pork ribs to the bowl & mix well to coat evenly. Tip the ribs and all the sauce into the pressure cooker.
